title: "A New IDC MarketScape Assesses Eleven Providers of Advanced Machine Learning Platforms"
excerpt: "International Data Corporation ( IDC) today published a new assessment of eleven companies offering the tools and frameworks for developing advanced machine learning (ML) models and solutions. The IDC MarketScape report uses a comprehensive framework to assess these vendors relative to a set of criteria that explain both short-term and long-term success in the ML platform market."
